column4: Hi, can anyone help me with a problem of enabling compiz after a ubuntu minimal install?
IF you are using Gnome be sure to install the compiz-gnome package
you might have to restart GDM "sudo service gdm restart" this will log you out!!!
do you have 3d support enabled?  that's certainly a requirement
im not sure. How can I check that?
for starters you could try "glxinfo | grep -i direct", what gfx card to you have?
lspci | grep -i vga if you aren't sure about gfx card
I can get 3d working on a full ubuntu installation. I just seem to be missing something with the minimal install.
sorry - i can't help with ATI issues, best of luck!
NICE -- use alt+f2 to start it instead
